ygData.subject: RE: Lvls After Expansion Pak
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the single reason why I quit Baldur s Gate. As soon as I installed TSC, I went directly from 7th to 8th (cap in BG:TSC) because I had gotten so many
ygData.messageBody:
This is the single reason why I quit Baldur's Gate. As soon as I installed
TSC, I went directly from 7th to 8th (cap in BG:TSC) because I had gotten so
many xp. What fun is it if you have no goals for your character? The thing
that keeps me playing EQ is the fact that I have so many goals to attain.
The abilities and spells are spaced out to where you are dying to get to
that next level. If it wasn't for this, what reason would we all play?

Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk

> From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>
> from 50 to what ever Lvl just cause they have enough exp too. Think about
> it, would you wanna install the expansion pak just to see "You moved up a
> level(s), Welcome to level 60!" or higher? What fun would that be?
>
